text: Curious George is the main character of a series of popular children's books by the same name. It was written by Hans Augusto Rey and Margret Rey. The books feature a curious brown monkey named George, who is brought from his home in Africa by "The Man with The Yellow Hat" to live with him in a big city. Category:American children's books Category:1940s books Category:Monkeys Category:Fictional primates
title: Curious George
